document_data.name: Carrig Cymrych III
document_data.mainbody: '''Carrig Cymrych III''' was High King of the [[Moonshae Isles]] for a year at the turn of the 6{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|32}}
document_data.Relationships: He was a member of the [[Cymrych Dynasty]] and the son of his predecessor, High King [[Tuathal Cymrych|Tuathal]]. His successor was his son, [[Colin Cymrych]]. His wife was Queen [[Abigail (queen)|Abigail]].
document_data.History:
Carrig III assumed the throne of the High King in the {{YearlinkName|499}}, after the assassination of his father. He too was assassinated [[500 DR|the next year]].

Following his death, Queen Abigail appointed [[Edmund Kincaid]] as regent because Carrig III's heir, Colin, was only eight years old. Colin would eventually assume his father's throne in the {{YearlinkName|507}}.
